definition: to smooth whiskers and pat a horse's bottom (idiom); to use flatter to get what one wants/to toady/boot-licking
(idiom) to compare favorably with men in terms of ability, bravery etc/to be a match for men/lit. not conceding to men (beard and eyebrows)

sentences.english: Don't wear too much perfume or aftershave.
sentences.chinese: 不要使用太多香水或鬚後水。

sentences.english: Forget witty chat-up lines and splashing on the aftershave .
sentences.chinese: 忘了那些風趣的搭訕和鬚後水吧。

sentences.english: Characters' long beards and hairs are pasted with real hairs.
sentences.chinese: 人物的長鬚長髮常是用真頭髮貼上去的。

sentences.english: Most aftershaves contain alcohol, which is a natural astringent and disinfectant.
sentences.chinese: 大多鬚後水含酒精，這是一種天然的止血劑和殺菌劑。

sentences.english: Both his hair and beard were dark. He walked behind the White- cowled Elder, and to his left.
sentences.chinese: 另一位身著黑袍，黑髮黑鬚，跟在白袍長老左後方。

sentences.english: Hey, I love your aftershave. What is it?It's Yardley.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡你的鬚後水，什麼牌子？

sentences.english: He's always borrowing his father's after-shave lotion.
sentences.chinese: 他總是借用父親的鬚後水。

sentences.english: Rubbed a finger and thumb over his lips and through his beard.
sentences.chinese: 他用手指按了按嘴脣，撫了下長鬚。

sentences.english: Parents need to sign on a contract with our company.
sentences.chinese: 學生家長鬚與公司籤立合同。

sentences.english: The long beards and hairs are made of leather rather than real hairs .
sentences.chinese: 人物的長鬚長髮也是皮刻而成，一般不用真發。

sentences.english: Pop-up trimmer for moustache and sideburns.
sentences.chinese: 彈出式修剪刀用於修剪長鬚和鬢角。

sentences.english: There was a mystery surrounding this black bearded, handsome man.
sentences.chinese: 這個蓄着黑鬚的英俊男人的周圍縈繞着一團疑雲。

sentences.english: He had a mustache and a pointed beard.
sentences.chinese: 他嘴脣上有一排鬍子，下頷蓄着一撮山羊鬚。

sentences.english: And Australian scientists have successfully bred seven wobbegong sharks to release into the wild.
sentences.chinese: 澳洲科學家成功孵育七隻斑紋鬚鯊，釋放海中。

sentences.english: The arrangement is made subject to your approval.
sentences.chinese: 這項安排鬚經你的同意。

sentences.english: Inside the small boat were several large yellow fin tuna.
sentences.chinese: 小船裏有幾條黃色長鬚金槍魚。

definition: tassel/sth shaped like a tassel (e.g. a leaf etc)/ribbon
Yunlong district of Xuzhou city 徐州市[Xu2 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu/Yunlong county in Dali Bai autonomous prefecture 大理白族自治州[Da4 li3 Bai2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan
skin cast off during molting/exuvia/to pupate/to molt/to slough/to cast off an old skin or shell
center or bull's eye of an archery target (old)/goal/target
